parameters.command:
powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "mkdir 'E:
8n_docker_strick\videos_out' -Force | Out-Null; Get-ChildItem 'E:
8n_docker_strick\videos_in' -File | Where-Object { $_.Extension -match '^\.(mp4|mov|mkv|m4v|avi)$' } | Sort-Object FullName | ForEach-Object { "file '" + ( ($_.FullName -replace '\\','/') -replace ''' , '''' ) + "'" } | Set-Content 'E:
8n_docker_strick\videos_out\concat.txt' -Encoding utf8"

ffmpeg -y -f concat -safe 0 -i "E:\n8n_docker_strick\videos_out\concat.txt" -fflags +genpts -vf fps=30 -c:v libx264 -preset veryfast -crf 18 -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a 192k "E:\n8n_docker_strick\videos_out\joined_final.mp4"
